summary: Prevents automatic reloading after each crossbow shot and allows you to reload whenever you want. You can change reload button in the MCM.
descriptionHtml:
Prevents automatic reloading after each crossbow shot and allows you to reload whenever you want. You can change reload button in the MCM.
If you set reload button to attack button you will need to select "Hide no bolts message" option in MCM to remove this message.
You will need to reequip currently equipped bolts after installing the mod to start using it.
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]SkyUI[/url] are required.
[youtube]4yPuBUdewCw[/youtube]
[heading]Compatibility[/heading]
Should be compatible with everything. Doesn't change any object in the game. Can work with crossbows from mods.
[heading]How it works[/heading]
The script unequips currently equipped bolts and reequips it after pressing reloading key
author: Genebriss
